channel.title: New Members - Unofficial Rules
channel.description:
Use google and wikipedia to reply to topics you have no clue about Add iirc to your posts so your shit is slightly more acceptable Add a little sarcasm, trolling and punctuation to posts where you don't know what you're on about Use only lowercase so it looks like you put little effort into your well researched post If most previous posters in a topic have used lowercase, you must do too Use the phrases 'hitler', 'nazi', and 'sieg heil' in your post - include images for bonus points Mention IRC to show you're down with the homies Suck superior cock, but not too superior Call people 'ignorant', 'retarded' and 'stupid' at every opportunity. The more you do this the higher your IQ becomes Do not mention or try to interfere with the community matrix Do not lie or post other peoples work. People will spend their weekend trying to catch you out Do not use proprietary software or code Agree that the oldest and hardest programming languages are the best Never try to do something for the community Never use the word 'moparscape' unless used in derogatory context Never say 'lawl' if you find something funny - especially on IRC Do not admit to listening to anything but independent music Mention communism Do not use anything mainstream Pretend you are cool and hot irl, but post pics Never say you are smart Never call someone a family idiot Make careful use of the terms 'hacking', 'hacker', 'coding', 'spyware', 'virus' and 'server' Tell new community members that they do not deserve it Always spell superior members names exactly as they appear with correct punctuation and case Never suggest a topic to be stickied or locked Say 'not funny' to make the people who laughed feel like idiots and suck your dick Say 'old' to make the people who thought it was amazing feel like idiots and suck your dick Do not show off or acknowledge forum awards Pretend that you think forum awards are worthless
If you have any suggestions, I'll add them. ps, this isn't supposed to be funny it's a genuine guide

item.title: New Members - Unofficial Rules
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

Use google and wikipedia to reply to topics you have no clue about

Add iirc to your posts so your shit is slightly more acceptable

Add a little sarcasm, trolling and punctuation to posts where you don’t know what you’re on about

Use only lowercase so it looks like you put little effort into your well researched post

If most previous posters in a topic have used lowercase, you must do too

Use the phrases ‘hitler’, ‘nazi’, and ‘sieg heil’ in your post - include images for bonus points

Mention IRC to show you’re down with the homies

Suck superior cock, but not too superior

Call people ‘ignorant’, ‘retarded’ and ‘stupid’ at every opportunity. The more you do this the higher your IQ becomes

Do not mention or try to interfere with the community matrix

Do not lie or post other peoples work. People will spend their weekend trying to catch you out

Do not use proprietary software or code

Agree that the oldest and hardest programming languages are the best

Never try to do something for the community

Never use the word ‘moparscape’ unless used in derogatory context

Never say ‘lawl’ if you find something funny - especially on IRC

Do not admit to listening to anything but independent music

Mention communism

Do not use anything mainstream

Pretend you are cool and hot irl, but post pics

Never say you are smart

Never call someone a family idiot

Make careful use of the terms ‘hacking’, ‘hacker’, ‘coding’, ‘spyware’, ‘virus’ and ‘server’

Tell new community members that they do not deserve it

Always spell superior members names exactly as they appear with correct punctuation and case

Never suggest a topic to be stickied or locked

Say ‘not funny’ to make the people who laughed feel like idiots and suck your dick

Say ‘old’ to make the people who thought it was amazing feel like idiots and suck your dick

Do not show off or acknowledge forum awards

Pretend that you think forum awards are worthless

If you have any suggestions, I’ll add them.

ps, this isn’t supposed to be funny it’s a genuine guide

Read full topic
